mapper.select:
/* USE : VendrMapper.getHqVendrList */
SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD, A.VENDR_CD, A.VENDR_NM, A.OWNER_NM, A.BIZ_NO, A.BIZ_TYPE_CD, A.BIZ_ITEM_CD, A.TEL_NO, A.FAX_NO, A.EMAIL_ADDR, A.POST_NO, A.ADDR, A.ADDR_DTL, A.SHIP_FG, A.VAT_INCLD_YN, A.USE_YN, A.REMARK, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.VENDOR_FG
FROM TB_HQ_VENDOR A
AND A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} --본사코드
AND A.VENDR_CD LIKE '%'||#{vendrCd}||'%' --거래처코드
AND A.VENDR_NM LIKE '%'||#{vendrNm}||'%' --거래처명
AND A.VENDOR_FG = #{vendorFg} --거래처구분
ORDER BY A.VENDR_CD

/* USE : VendrMapper.getMsVendrList */
SELECT A.STORE_CD, A.VENDR_CD, A.VENDR_NM, A.OWNER_NM, A.BIZ_NO, A.BIZ_TYPE_CD, A.BIZ_ITEM_CD, A.TEL_NO, A.FAX_NO, A.EMAIL_ADDR, A.POST_NO, A.ADDR, A.ADDR_DTL, A.SHIP_FG, A.VAT_INCLD_YN, A.USE_YN, A.REMARK, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.VENDOR_FG
FROM TB_MS_VENDOR A
AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} --매장코드
AND A.VENDR_CD LIKE '%'||#{vendrCd}||'%' --거래처코드
AND A.VENDR_NM LIKE '%'||#{vendrNm}||'%' --거래처명
AND A.VENDOR_FG = #{vendorFg} --거래처구분
ORDER BY A.VENDR_CD
mapper.insert: /* USE : VendrMapper.insertHqVendr */ INSERT INTO TB_HQ_VENDOR ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, VENDR_CD, VENDR_NM, OWNER_NM, BIZ_NO, BIZ_TYPE_CD, BIZ_ITEM_CD, TEL_NO, FAX_NO, EMAIL_ADDR, POST_NO, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, SHIP_FG, VAT_INCLD_YN, USE_YN, REMARK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, VENDOR_FG, COMPANY_FG, BUSINESS_FG, PURCHASE_ID, CORPORATION_NUMBER, BUSINESS_STATUS, INDUSTRY, HOMEPAGE, OWNER_TEL_NO, OWNER_EMAIL, MANAGER_NM, MANAGER_TEL_NO, MANAGER_EMAIL, MANAGER_SPOT, MANAGER_PHONE_NO, BANK_CD, ACCOUNT_NO, DEPOSITOR, COLLECT_FG, DOUZONE_ERP, CREDIT_LIMIT, COLLATERAL_TYPE, COLLATERAL_AMT, CONTRAST_DATE, COLLATOR_STORE, COLLATOR_COMPANY, DEAL_START_DATE, DEAL_END_DATE, LAST_SALE_DATE, LAST_DEPOSIT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, '0000000', #{vendrCd}, #{vendrNm}, #{ownerNm}, #{bizNo}, #{bizTypeCd}, #{bizItemCd}, #{telNo}, #{faxNo}, #{emailAddr}, #{postNo}, #{addr}, #{addrDtl}, #{shipFg}, #{vatIncldYn}, #{useYn}, #{remark}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, #{vendorFg}, #{companyFg}, #{businessFg}, #{purchaseId}, #{corporationNumber}, #{businessStatus}, #{industry}, #{homepage}, #{ownerTelNo}, #{ownerEmail}, #{managerNm}, #{managerTelNo}, #{managerEmail}, #{managerSpot}, #{managerPhoneNo}, #{bankCd}, #{accountNo}, #{depositor}, #{collectFg}, #{douzoneErp}, #{creditLimit}, #{collateralType}, #{collateralAmt}, #{contrastDate}, #{collatorStore}, #{collatorCompany}, #{dealStartDate}, #{dealEndDate}, #{lastSaleDate}, #{lastDepositDate} )

/* USE : VendrMapper.insertMsVendr */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_VENDOR ( STORE_CD, VENDR_CD, VENDR_NM, OWNER_NM, BIZ_NO, BIZ_TYPE_CD, BIZ_ITEM_CD, TEL_NO, FAX_NO, EMAIL_ADDR, POST_NO, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, SHIP_FG, VAT_INCLD_YN, USE_YN, REMARK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, VENDOR_FG ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{vendrCd}, #{vendrNm}, #{ownerNm}, #{bizNo}, #{bizTypeCd}, #{bizItemCd}, #{telNo}, #{faxNo}, #{emailAddr}, #{postNo}, #{addr}, #{addrDtl}, #{shipFg}, #{vatIncldYn}, #{useYn}, #{remark}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, #{vendorFg} )
mapper.select: /* USE : VendrMapper.getHqDtlInfo */ SELECT thv.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thv.VENDR_CD, thv.VENDR_NM, thv.OWNER_NM, thv.BIZ_NO, SUBSTR(thv.BIZ_NO,0,3) AS BIZ_NO1, SUBSTR(thv.BIZ_NO,4,2) AS BIZ_NO2, SUBSTR(thv.BIZ_NO,6,5) AS BIZ_NO3, thv.BIZ_TYPE_CD, thv.BIZ_ITEM_CD, thv.TEL_NO, thv.FAX_NO, thv.EMAIL_ADDR, thv.POST_NO, thv.ADDR, thv.ADDR_DTL, thv.SHIP_FG, thv.VAT_INCLD_YN, thv.USE_YN, thv.REMARK, thv.REG_DT, thv.REG_ID, thv.MOD_DT, thv.MOD_ID, thv.VENDOR_FG, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '067' AND NMCODE_CD = thv.SHIP_FG) AS SHIP_FG_NM, --TODO 코드 변경 필요 (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '011' AND NMCODE_CD = thv.VENDOR_FG) AS VENDOR_FG_NM, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '067' AND NMCODE_CD = thv.USE_YN) AS USE_YN_NM, (CASE thv.VAT_INCLD_YN WHEN 'N' THEN '별도' WHEN 'Y' THEN '포함' END) AS VAT_INCLD_YN_NM, thv.COMPANY_FG, (CASE thv.COMPANY_FG WHEN '0000' THEN '미정' ELSE '' END) AS COMPANY_FG_NM, thv.BUSINESS_FG, (CASE thv.BUSINESS_FG WHEN '0000' THEN '국민대학교' ELSE '' END) AS BUSINESS_FG_NM, thv.PURCHASE_ID, thv.CORPORATION_NUMBER, thv.BUSINESS_STATUS, thv.INDUSTRY, thv.HOMEPAGE, thv.OWNER_TEL_NO, thv.OWNER_EMAIL, thv.MANAGER_NM, thv.MANAGER_TEL_NO, thv.MANAGER_EMAIL, thv.MANAGER_SPOT, thv.MANAGER_PHONE_NO, thv.BANK_CD, thv.ACCOUNT_NO, thv.DEPOSITOR, thv.COLLECT_FG, thv.DOUZONE_ERP, thv.CREDIT_LIMIT, thv.COLLATERAL_TYPE, thv.COLLATERAL_AMT, thv.CONTRAST_DATE, thv.COLLATOR_STORE, thv.COLLATOR_COMPANY, thv.DEAL_START_DATE, thv.DEAL_END_DATE, thv.LAST_SALE_DATE, thv.LAST_DEPOSIT_DATE, tmm.MEMBR_NO, tmm.MEMBR_NM FROM TB_HQ_VENDOR thv, ( SELECT MEMBR_ORGN_CD, MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, CUSTOMER_FG, CUSTOMER_CD AS VENDR_CD FROM TB_MB_MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND CUSTOMER_FG = '1' ) tmm WHERE 1=1 AND thv.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thv.VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD (+)= thv.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmm.VENDR_CD (+)= thv.VENDR_CD

/* USE : VendrMapper.getMsDtlInfo */ SELECT STORE_CD, VENDR_CD, VENDR_NM, OWNER_NM, BIZ_NO, SUBSTR(tmv.BIZ_NO,0,3) AS BIZ_NO1, SUBSTR(tmv.BIZ_NO,4,2) AS BIZ_NO2, SUBSTR(tmv.BIZ_NO,6,5) AS BIZ_NO3, BIZ_TYPE_CD, BIZ_ITEM_CD, TEL_NO, FAX_NO, EMAIL_ADDR, POST_NO, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, SHIP_FG, VAT_INCLD_YN, USE_YN, REMARK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, VENDOR_FG, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '067' AND NMCODE_CD = tmv.SHIP_FG) AS SHIP_FG_NM, --TODO 코드 변경 필요 (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '011' AND NMCODE_CD = tmv.VENDOR_FG) AS VENDOR_FG_NM, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '067' AND NMCODE_CD = tmv.USE_YN) AS USE_YN_NM, CASE tmv.VAT_INCLD_YN WHEN 'N' THEN '별도' WHEN 'Y' THEN '포함' END AS VAT_INCLD_YN_NM FROM TB_MS_VENDOR tmv WHERE VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
mapper.update: /* USE : VendrMapper.modifyHqVendr */ UPDATE TB_HQ_VENDOR SET VENDR_NM = #{vendrNm}, OWNER_NM = #{ownerNm}, BIZ_NO = #{bizNo}, BIZ_TYPE_CD = #{bizTypeCd}, BIZ_ITEM_CD = #{bizItemCd}, TEL_NO = #{telNo}, FAX_NO = #{faxNo}, EMAIL_ADDR = #{emailAddr}, POST_NO = #{postNo}, ADDR = #{addr}, ADDR_DTL = #{addrDtl}, SHIP_FG = #{shipFg}, VAT_INCLD_YN = #{vatIncldYn}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, REMARK = #{remark}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId}, VENDOR_FG = #{vendorFg}, COMPANY_FG = #{companyFg}, BUSINESS_FG = #{businessFg}, PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId}, CORPORATION_NUMBER = #{corporationNumber}, BUSINESS_STATUS = #{businessStatus}, INDUSTRY = #{industry}, HOMEPAGE = #{homepage}, OWNER_TEL_NO = #{ownerTelNo}, OWNER_EMAIL = #{ownerEmail}, MANAGER_NM = #{managerNm}, MANAGER_TEL_NO = #{managerTelNo}, MANAGER_EMAIL = #{managerEmail}, MANAGER_SPOT = #{managerSpot}, MANAGER_PHONE_NO = #{managerPhoneNo}, BANK_CD = #{bankCd}, ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo}, DEPOSITOR = #{depositor}, COLLECT_FG = #{collectFg}, DOUZONE_ERP = #{douzoneErp}, CREDIT_LIMIT = #{creditLimit}, COLLATERAL_TYPE = #{collateralType}, COLLATERAL_AMT = #{collateralAmt}, CONTRAST_DATE = #{contrastDate}, COLLATOR_STORE = #{collatorStore}, COLLATOR_COMPANY = #{collatorCompany}, DEAL_START_DATE = #{dealStartDate}, DEAL_END_DATE = #{dealEndDate}, LAST_SALE_DATE = #{lastSaleDate}, LAST_DEPOSIT_DATE = #{lastDepositDate} WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd}

/* USE : VendrMapper.modifyMsVendr */ UPDATE TB_MS_VENDOR SET VENDR_NM = #{vendrNm}, OWNER_NM = #{ownerNm}, BIZ_NO = #{bizNo}, BIZ_TYPE_CD = #{bizTypeCd}, BIZ_ITEM_CD = #{bizItemCd}, TEL_NO = #{telNo}, FAX_NO = #{faxNo}, EMAIL_ADDR = #{emailAddr}, POST_NO = #{postNo}, ADDR = #{addr}, ADDR_DTL = #{addrDtl}, SHIP_FG = #{shipFg}, VAT_INCLD_YN = #{vatIncldYn}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, REMARK = #{remark}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId}, VENDOR_FG = #{vendorFg} WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd}
mapper.select:
/* USE : VendrMapper.getHqVendrProdList */ SELECT thvp.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM, thp.SPLY_UPRC, thp.USE_YN FROM TB_HQ_VENDOR_PROD thvp, TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE 1=1 AND thvp.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thvp.PROD_CD (+)= thp.PROD_CD AND thvp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thvp.VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd} AND thvp.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND thvp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
ORDER BY PROD_CD

/* USE : VendrMapper.getMsVendrProdList */ SELECT tmvp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tmp.SPLY_UPRC, tmp.USE_YN FROM TB_MS_VENDOR_PROD tmvp, TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE 1=1 AND tmvp.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmvp.PROD_CD (+)= tmp.PROD_CD AND tmvp.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmvp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmvp.VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd} AND tmvp.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND tmvp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )

/* USE : VendrMapper.getHqProdList */ SELECT PROD_CD, PROD_NM, SPLY_UPRC FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE 1=1 AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.USE_YN = 'Y' AND thp.PO_PROD_FG IN ('1', '2')
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%' -- 상품코드
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' -- 상품명
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_HQ_VENDOR_PROD thvp WHERE 1=1 AND thvp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD --TODO 테스트 후 추가 AND thvp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thvp.VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd} AND thvp.USE_YN = 'Y' ) ORDER BY PROD_CD

/* USE : VendrMapper.getMsProdList */ SELECT PROD_CD, PROD_NM, SPLY_UPRC FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE 1=1 AND tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.USE_YN = 'Y' AND tmp.PO_PROD_FG = '4'
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'-- 상품코드
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' -- 상품명
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_MS_VENDOR_PROD tmvp WHERE 1=1 AND tmvp.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmvp.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND tmvp.VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd} AND tmvp.USE_YN = 'Y' )
mapper.update: /* USE : VendrMapper.mergeHqVendrProd */ MERGE INTO TB_HQ_VENDOR_PROD thvp USING ( SELECT #{hqOfficeCd} AS HQ_OFFICE_CD, #{vendrCd} AS VENDR_CD, #{prodCd} AS PROD_CD, #{splyUprc} AS SPLY_UPRC, #{useYn} AS USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM DUAL ) thvpc ON ( thvpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thvp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thvpc.VENDR_CD = thvp.VENDR_CD AND thvpc.PROD_CD = thvp.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET thvp.USE_YN = thvpc.USE_YN, thvp.MOD_DT = thvpc.MOD_DT, thvp.MOD_ID = thvpc.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( thvp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thvp.HQ_BRAND_CD, thvp.VENDR_CD, thvp.PROD_CD, thvp.SPLY_UPRC, thvp.USE_YN, thvp.REG_DT, thvp.REG_ID, thvp.MOD_DT, thvp.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( thvpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD, '0000000', thvpc.VENDR_CD, thvpc.PROD_CD, thvpc.SPLY_UPRC, thvpc.USE_YN, thvpc.REG_DT, thvpc.REG_ID, thvpc.MOD_DT, thvpc.MOD_ID )

/* USE : VendrMapper.mergeMsVendrProd */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_VENDOR_PROD tmvp USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, #{prodCd} AS PROD_CD, #{vendrCd} AS VENDR_CD, #{splyUprc} AS SPLY_UPRC, #{useYn} AS USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM DUAL ) tmvpc ON ( tmvpc.STORE_CD = tmvp.STORE_CD AND tmvpc.VENDR_CD = tmvp.VENDR_CD AND tmvpc.PROD_CD = tmvp.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tmvp.USE_YN = tmvpc.USE_YN, tmvp.MOD_DT = tmvpc.MOD_DT, tmvp.MOD_ID = tmvpc.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( tmvp.STORE_CD, tmvp.VENDR_CD, tmvp.PROD_CD, tmvp.SPLY_UPRC, tmvp.USE_YN, tmvp.REG_DT, tmvp.REG_ID, tmvp.MOD_DT, tmvp.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( tmvpc.STORE_CD, tmvpc.VENDR_CD, tmvpc.PROD_CD, tmvpc.SPLY_UPRC, tmvpc.USE_YN, tmvpc.REG_DT, tmvpc.REG_ID, tmvpc.MOD_DT, tmvpc.MOD_ID )
mapper.insert: /* USE : VendrMapper.getMembrPostpaidSaveMerge */ MERGE INTO TB_MB_MEMBER_POSTPAID_STORE A USING ( SELECT #{hqOfficeCd} AS MEMBR_ORGN_CD, #{membrNo} AS MEMBR_NO, STORE_CD, 'Y' AS USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = B.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.MEMBR_NO = B.MEMBR_NO ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.MEMBR_ORGN_CD, A.MEMBR_NO, A.STORE_CD, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.MEMBR_ORGN_CD, B.MEMBR_NO, B.STORE_CD, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )
